years://regnal.name: Regnal Years Reference Data
years://regnal.description: CSV mapping of regnal year identifiers (e.g. Vict/50) to reign, year of reign, and calendar date ranges. Pre-1963 legislation is canonically identified by regnal year, though calendar years usually work too via API redirect. Use regnal years to disambiguate when a calendar year spans two regnal years.
